verses.verse: וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after תַּ֣מּוּ <WH8552> were clean כָל־ <WH3605> all הַגּ֔וֹי <WH1471> And it came to pass when all the people לַעֲב֖וֹר <WH5674> passed over אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> Jordan פ וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> spake יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> that the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> unto Joshua לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

קְח֤וּ <WH3947> Take לָכֶם֙ מִן־ <WH4480> from הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> out of the people שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> ten אֲנָשִׁ֑ים <WH582> men אִישׁ־ <WH376> a man אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> out of every אִישׁ־ <WH376> man אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> one מִשָּֽׁבֶט׃ <WH7626> tribe

וְצַוּ֣וּ <WH6680> And command אוֹתָם֮ <WH853> לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> ye them saying שְׂאֽוּ־ <WH5375> Take לָכֶ֨ם מִזֶּ֜ה <WH2088> here מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> you hence out of the midst הַיַּרְדֵּ֗ן <WH3383> of Jordan מִמַּצַּב֙ <WH4673> stood רַגְלֵ֣י <WH7272> feet הַכֹּהֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> out of the place where the priests' הָכִ֖ין <WH3559> firm שְׁתֵּים־ <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <WH6240> ten אֲבָנִ֑ים <WH68> stones וְהַעֲבַרְתֶּ֤ם <WH5674> and ye shall carry them over אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> עִמָּכֶ֔ם <WH5973> you וְהִנַּחְתֶּ֣ם <WH3240> with you and leave אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> בַּמָּל֕וֹן <WH4411> them in the lodging place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> you תָּלִ֥ינוּ <WH3885> where ye shall lodge ב֖וֹ הַלָּֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> this night ס

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> called יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <WH3091> Then Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> about שְׁנֵ֤ים <WH8147> both הֶֽעָשָׂר֙ <WH6240> ten אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> men אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom הֵכִ֖ין <WH3559> whom he had prepared מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel אִישׁ־ <WH376> a man אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> out of every אִישׁ־ <WH376> men אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> one מִשָּֽׁבֶט׃ <WH7626> tribe

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לָהֶם֙ יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> And Joshua עִ֠בְרוּ <WH5674> unto them Pass over לִפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> before אֲר֧וֹן <WH727> the ark יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> your God אֶל־ <WH413> into תּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> into the midst הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> of Jordan וְהָרִ֨ימוּ <WH7311> and take ye up לָכֶ֜ם אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man אֶ֤בֶן <WH68> of you a stone אַחַת֙ <WH259> every עַל־ <WH5921> on שִׁכְמ֔וֹ <WH7926> upon his shoulder לְמִסְפַּ֖ר <WH4557> according unto the number שִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> of the tribes בְנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

לְמַ֗עַן <WH4616> because of תִּֽהְיֶ֛ה <WH1961> become זֹ֥את <WH2063> likewise א֖וֹת <WH226> That this may be a sign בְּקִרְבְּכֶ֑ם <WH7130> among כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יִשְׁאָל֨וּן <WH7592> ask בְּנֵיכֶ֤ם <WH1121> you [that] when your children מָחָר֙ <WH4279> [their fathers] in time to come לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying מָ֛ה <WH4100> What הָאֲבָנִ֥ים <WH68> stones הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these לָכֶֽם׃

וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֣ם <WH559> Then ye shall answer לָהֶ֗ם אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> Because נִכְרְת֜וּ <WH3772> were cut off מֵימֵ֤י <WH4325> them That the waters הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <WH3383> of Jordan מִפְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> before אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּעָבְרוֹ֙ <WH5674> when it passed over בַּיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> Jordan נִכְרְת֖וּ <WH3772> were cut off מֵ֣י <WH4325> the waters הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> of Jordan וְ֠הָיוּ <WH1961> shall become הָאֲבָנִ֨ים <WH68> and these stones הָאֵ֧לֶּה <WH428> shall be for לְזִכָּר֛וֹן <WH2146> shall be for a memorial לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ever

וַיַּעֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> did כֵ֣ן <WH3651> Thus בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <WH3478> of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוֹשֻׁעַ֒ <WH3091> so as Joshua וַיִּשְׂא֡וּ <WH5375> and took up שְׁתֵּֽי־ <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵ֨ה <WH6240> ten אֲבָנִ֜ים <WH68> stones מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> out of the midst הַיַּרְדֵּ֗ן <WH3383> of Jordan כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֤ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> as the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> unto Joshua לְמִסְפַּ֖ר <WH4557> according to the number שִׁבְטֵ֣י <WH7626> of the tribes בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיַּעֲבִר֤וּם <WH5674> and carried them over עִמָּם֙ <WH5973> with אֶל־ <WH413> them הַמָּל֔וֹן <WH4411> with them unto the place where they lodged וַיַּנִּח֖וּם <WH3240> and laid them down שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וּשְׁתֵּ֧ים <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <WH6240> ten אֲבָנִ֗ים <WH68> stones הֵקִ֣ים <WH6965> set up יְהוֹשֻׁעַ֮ <WH3091> And Joshua בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst הַיַּרְדֵּן֒ <WH3383> of Jordan תַּ֗חַת <WH8478> Thahash מַצַּב֙ <WH4673> stood רַגְלֵ֣י <WH7272> in the place where the feet הַכֹּהֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> of the priests נֹשְׂאֵ֖י <WH5375> which bare אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark הַבְּרִ֑ית <WH1285> of the covenant וַיִּ֣הְיוּ <WH1961> become שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> are there עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> and they are there unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֞ים <WH3548> For the priests נֹשְׂאֵ֣י <WH5375> which bare הָאָר֗וֹן <WH727> the ark עֹמְדִים֮ <WH5975> stood בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst הַיַּרְדֵּן֒ <WH3383> of Jordan עַ֣ד <WH5704> until תֹּ֣ם <WH8552> was finished כָּֽל־ <WH3605> everything הַ֠דָּבָר <WH1697> until every thing אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after צִוָּ֨ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> that the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> Joshua לְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> to speak אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> unto the people כְּכֹ֛ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> according to all that Moses אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <WH3091> Joshua וַיְמַהֲר֥וּ <WH4116> hasted הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> and the people וַֽיַּעֲבֹֽרוּ׃ <WH5674> and passed over

וַיְהִ֛י <WH1961> become כַּֽאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after תַּ֥ם <WH8552> were clean כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> And it came to pass when all the people לַֽעֲב֑וֹר <WH5674> passed over וַיַּעֲבֹ֧ר <WH5674> passed over אֲרוֹן־ <WH727> that the ark יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> and the priests לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> in the presence הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> of the people

וַ֠יַּעַבְרוּ <WH5674> passed over בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> And the children רְאוּבֵ֨ן <WH7205> of Reuben וּבְנֵי־ <WH1121> and the children גָ֜ד <WH1410> of Gad וַחֲצִ֨י <WH2677> and half שֵׁ֤בֶט <WH7626> the tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּׁה֙ <WH4519> of Manasseh חֲמֻשִׁ֔ים <WH2571> armed לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> spake אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> as מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> as Moses

כְּאַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> About forty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand חֲלוּצֵ֣י <WH2502> prepared הַצָּבָ֑א <WH6635> for war עָבְר֞וּ <WH5674> passed over לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> before יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> unto battle אֶ֖ל <WH413> to עַֽרְב֥וֹת <WH6160> to the plains יְרִיחֽוֹ׃ <WH3405> of Jericho ס

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> On that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he גִּדַּ֤ל <WH1431> magnified יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> Joshua בְּעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> in the sight כָּל־ <WH3605> of all יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of all Israel וַיִּֽרְא֣וּ <WH3372> and they feared אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> as they יָרְא֥וּ <WH3372> him as they feared אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> Moses כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> all the days חַיָּֽיו׃ <WH2416> of his life פ
וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> spake יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> unto Joshua לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

צַוֵּה֙ <WH6680> Command אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> the priests נֹשְׂאֵ֖י <WH5375> that bear אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark הָעֵד֑וּת <WH5715> of the testimony וְיַעֲל֖וּ <WH5927> that they come up מִן־ <WH4480> from הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> out of Jordan

וַיְצַ֣ו <WH6680> therefore commanded יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> Joshua אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> the priests לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying עֲל֖וּ <WH5927> Come ye up מִן־ <WH4480> from הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> out of Jordan

וַ֠יְהִי <WH1961> came [בַּעֲלֹות כ] (כַּעֲלֹ֨ות <WH5927> arise ק) הַכֹּהֲנִ֜ים <WH3548> And it came to pass when the priests נֹשְׂאֵ֨י <WH5375> that bare אֲר֤וֹן <WH727> the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> out of the midst הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> of Jordan נִתְּק֗וּ <WH5423> were lifted up כַּפּוֹת֙ <WH3709> [and] the soles רַגְלֵ֣י <WH7272> feet הַכֹּהֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> of the priests' אֶ֖ל <WH413> to הֶחָרָבָ֑ה <WH2724> unto the dry land וַיָּשֻׁ֤בוּ <WH7725> returned מֵֽי־ <WH4325> that the waters הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <WH3383> of Jordan לִמְקוֹמָ֔ם <WH4725> unto their place וַיֵּלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> and went כִתְמוֹל־ <WH8543> as שִׁלְשׁ֖וֹם <WH8032> [they did] before עַל־ <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> all גְּדוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH1415> over all his banks

וְהָעָ֗ם <WH5971> And the people עָלוּ֙ <WH5927> came up מִן־ <WH4480> from הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> out of Jordan בֶּעָשׂ֖וֹר <WH6218> on the tenth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <WH7223> [day] of the first וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <WH2583> and encamped בַּגִּלְגָּ֔ל <WH1537> in Gilgal בִּקְצֵ֖ה <WH7097> border מִזְרַ֥ח <WH4217> in the east יְרִיחֽוֹ׃ <WH3405> of Jericho

וְאֵת֩ <WH853> שְׁתֵּ֨ים <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵ֤ה <WH6240> ten הָֽאֲבָנִים֙ <WH68> stones הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> Those אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לָקְח֖וּ <WH3947> which they took out מִן־ <WH4480> from הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> of Jordan הֵקִ֥ים <WH6965> pitch יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> did Joshua בַּגִּלְגָּֽל׃ <WH1537> in Gilgal

וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> And he spake אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> When יִשְׁאָל֨וּן <WH7592> shall ask בְּנֵיכֶ֤ם <WH1121> When your children מָחָר֙ <WH4279> in time to come אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבוֹתָ֣ם <WH1> their fathers לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying מָ֖ה <WH4100> What הָאֲבָנִ֥ים <WH68> stones הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> are these

וְהוֹדַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> know אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵיכֶ֣ם <WH1121> Then ye shall let your children לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying בַּיַּבָּשָׁה֙ <WH3004> on dry land עָבַ֣ר <WH5674> came over יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <WH3383> this Jordan הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הוֹבִישׁ֩ <WH3001> dried up יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> For the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֜ם <WH430> your God אֶת־ <WH853> מֵ֧י <WH4325> the waters הַיַּרְדֵּ֛ן <WH3383> of Jordan מִפְּנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH6440> from before עַֽד־ <WH5704> until עָבְרְכֶ֑ם <WH5674> you until ye were passed over כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂה֩ <WH6213> did יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֧ם <WH430> your God לְיַם־ <WH3220> sea ס֛וּף <WH5488> to the Red אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הוֹבִ֥ישׁ <WH3001> which he dried up מִפָּנֵ֖ינוּ <WH6440> from before עַד־ <WH5704> until עָבְרֵֽנוּ׃ <WH5674> us until we were gone over

לְ֠מַעַן <WH4616> so דַּ֜עַת <WH1847> cunning כָּל־ <WH3605> all עַמֵּ֤י <WH5971> That all the people הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> of the earth אֶת־ <WH853> יַ֣ד <WH3027> the hand יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD כִּ֥י <WH3588> for חֲזָקָ֖ה <WH2389> that it [is] mighty הִ֑יא <WH1931> he לְמַ֧עַן <WH4616> so יְרָאתֶ֛ם <WH3372> that ye might fear אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> your God כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> for ever ס
